channel.add_contributor_desc: Add key contributors by searching for them below. Posts from these contributors will be prominently featured in your channel.
channel.add_keyword_filter_description: Add keyword filters to prevent posts from the wider network which contain this keyword from appearing in the channel.
channel.content_type_desc: First, choose whether you want your Channel to be open to anyone’s posts or closed to selected contributors when they use a specific hashtag.
channel.filter_content_desc: Filter content from the wider network to ensure you channel stays relevant.
channel.follow_bot_instruction: Just Follow <orangeText>{{botAccount}}</orangeText> from any Fediverse account to see all posts from the community All timeline.
channel.hashtag_desc: Add a channel hashtag using the form below. Every post on this hashtag will appear in the channel. This allows channel members to post to the channel even when they’re somewhere else in the network.
channel.keyword_desc: Use labels to keep your Channel on topic. Only posts using these keywords will appear in your Channel.
channel.keyword_empty_text: * You have not added any keyword to this channel yet.
channel.no_contributor_msg: * You have not added any contributors to this channel.
channel.no_keyword: You have not added any keyword to this channel yet.
channel.populate_channel_text: Populate your channel with content from across the New Social network. Here you can define rules that specify what content is included in your channel.
channel.select_content_type_desc: Select which types of content are included in this channel.
channel.min_channel_required: You must keep at least 5 favourite channels.

common.update_required_message: A new version of Patchwork App is available now. To continue using the app with the latest features and security improvements, please update now.
common.appearance_message: Your current theme is different from the saved setting. Which one do you want to use?

draft.title: Discard post?
draft.message: If you go back, your post will be lost. Would you like to save it as a draft?
draft.no_drafts_desc: No drafts available. Start creating your posts!

editPhotoModal.title: Edit photo
editPhotoModal.sensitiveWarning: This photo may include sensitive content for some groups of people.

compose.video_size_too_large: Video size should not be larger than 40 MB

conversation.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
conversation.no_message_requests: No message requests at the moment.
conversation.unencrypted_detail: Your messages are not secured with end-to-end encryption. Please avoid sharing sensitive information.
conversation.start_conversation_desc: Here you can chat with other people around, share posts, discuss and more.
The first user cannot be removed.

list.add_list_desc: Choose users whose posts will be displayed in the list.
list.delete_list_title: Are you sure you want to delete list?
list.follow_to_list_message: You need to be following @{{username}} to add them to a list.
list.include_reply: Include replies from list members to
list.list_empty_subtitle: There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list publish new posts, they will appear here.
list.list_only_member_desc: If someone is on this list, hide them in your channel posts to avoid seeing their posts twice.
list.no_lists_yet: You haven’t created any lists yet.
list.no_lists_yet_desc: Click on + button below to create your first list.

schema.replies_policy_invalid: Replies policy must be one of: followed, list, none

login.mastodon_login_instruction: Login with the server where you created your account
login.otp_not_receive_advice: Didn't receive the code? resend in {{time}} sec..
login.send_otp: We sent a code to your email
login.verification_otp_explanation: We've sent a 4-digit verification code to your email.
login.welcome_page_agreement: By continuing, you agree to our <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms>, <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

poll.poll_ended: A poll you have created has ended.
poll.poll_vote_ended: A poll you have voted in has ended.

quote.quote_removed_success: Your post was removed from the quote.
quote.quote_removed_error: Failed to remove your post from the quote. Please try again.
quote.pending_with_acct: Quote pending approval for post by {{acct}}.
quote.rejected: Quote was rejected by the original author.
quote.revoked: Quote was revoked by the original author.
quote.blocked_account: This post is hidden because you blocked the user.
quote.blocked_account_with_acct: Post by {{acct}} is hidden because you blocked the user.
quote.blocked_domain: This post is hidden because you blocked the domain.
quote.blocked_domain_with_acct: Post by {{acct}} is hidden because you blocked the domain.
quote.muted_account: This post is hidden because you muted the user.
quote.muted_account_with_acct: Post by {{acct}} is hidden because you muted the user.

spam.title: It's spam
spam.desc: Malicious links, fake engagement, or repetitive replies

legal.title: It's illegal
legal.desc: You believe it violates the law of your or the server's country

violation.title: It violates server rules
violation.desc: You are aware that it breaks specific rules

other.title: It's something else
other.desc: The issue does not fit into other categories

forward.anonymized_message: The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?

report.modal_title_category: Tell us what's going on with this post
report.modal_title_additional_info: Is there anything else you think we should know?

search.search_text_guide: Search for people, posts or hashtags

setting.delete_confirmation: You’ll be redirected to the official patchwork.io website, where you can follow the steps to permanently delete your account. This will permanently remove your account and all associated data.
setting.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

switch_account.no_accounts_yet: No accounts yet! Sign in or create account to get started.
switch_account.title: Switch account
switch_account.remove_account_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to remove this account:

switch_account.remove_account_failed_message: Failed to remove account. Please try again.

social_links.added_all_links_message: You have already added all available social links.
social_links.mastodon_user_validation_message: Mastodon users can only have up to 4 field attributes.

timeline.profile_update_success: Your profile has been updated successfully!
timeline.missingUsers: Some users from other servers may be missing.

deleteModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
deleteModal.description: All the comments, re-posts and likes will be lost.

draft.delete_alert: Are you sure you want to delete this drafted post?

timeline.confirm_delete_schedule: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule?

visibility.unlisted: Anyone, but not listed in timelines

validation.current_password_min: Current password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.new_password_min: New password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.new_password_same_as_current: New password cannot be the same as the current password
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.username_max: Username cannot be more than 20 characters
validation.username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.username_pattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

empty.title: No notifications
empty.description: You don't have any notifications yet. When other people interact with you, you'll see them here.

severed_relationships.title: Lost connections with {{name}}
severed_relationships.account_suspension: An admin from {{from}} has suspended {{target}}, which means you can no longer receive updates from them or interact with them.
severed_relationships.domain_block: An admin from {{from}} has blocked {{target}}, including {{followersCount}} of your followers and {{followingCount}} accounts you follow.
severed_relationships.user_domain_block: You have blocked {{target}}, removing {{followersCount}} of your followers and {{followingCount}} accounts you follow.

messages.moderation_warning: You have received a moderation warning

moderation_warning_details.action_delete_statuses: Some of your posts have been removed.
moderation_warning_details.action_mark_statuses_as_sensitive: Some of your posts have been marked as sensitive.
moderation_warning_details.action_none: Your account has received a moderation warning.
moderation_warning_details.action_sensitive: Your posts will be marked as sensitive from now on.

annual_report.message: Your {{year}} #Wrapstodon awaits! Unveil your year's highlights and memorable moments on Mastodon!

toast.image_incorrect_format_error: The data could not be read because it is not in the correct format.
toast.message_own_account_error: Can't send message to own account
toast.email_update_success: Email is updated successfully. Please log in with your new email.
toast.send_verifcation_code: Verification code is sent to your email.
toast.cant_send_to_own_account: Cannot send a message to your own account.
